support_op_ring_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem support_op_ring_equiv (p : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» (polynomial R)) : (op_ring_equiv R p).support = (unop p).support :=
  by
  induction p using MulOpposite.rec'
  cases p
  exact finsupp.support_map_range_of_injective _ _ op_injective
#align support_op_ring_equiv support_op_ring_equiv
op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial (n : ℕ) (r : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» R) :
    (op_ring_equiv R).symm (monomial n r) = op (monomial n (unop r)) :=
  (op_ring_equiv R).injective (by simp)
#align op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial
op_ring_equiv_symm_X:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_symm_X : (op_ring_equiv R).symm (X : polynomial («expr ᵐᵒᵖ» R)) = op X :=
  op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial 1 1
#align op_ring_equiv_symm_X op_ring_equiv_symm_X
op_ring_equiv_symm_C_mul_X_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
theorem op_ring_equiv_symm_C_mul_X_pow (r : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» R) (n : ℕ) :
    (op_ring_equiv R).symm (C r * X ^ n : polynomial («expr ᵐᵒᵖ» R)) = op (C (unop r) * X ^ n) := by
  rw [C_mul_X_pow_eq_monomial, op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial, ← C_mul_X_pow_eq_monomial]
#align op_ring_equiv_symm_C_mul_X_pow op_ring_equiv_symm_C_mul_X_pow
op_ring_equiv_symm_C:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_symm_C (a : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» R) : (op_ring_equiv R).symm (C a) = op (C (unop a)) :=
  op_ring_equiv_symm_monomial 0 a
#align op_ring_equiv_symm_C op_ring_equiv_symm_C
op_ring_equiv_op_monomial:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/-

-- for maintenance purposes: `by simp [op_ring_equiv]` proves this lemma
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_op_monomial (n : ℕ) (r : R) :
    op_ring_equiv R (op (monomial n r : polynomial R)) = monomial n (op r) := by
  simp only [op_ring_equiv, RingEquiv.trans_apply, ring_equiv.op_apply_apply, RingEquiv.toAddEquiv_eq_coe,
    add_equiv.mul_op_apply, [anonymous], AddEquiv.coe_trans, op_add_equiv_apply, RingEquiv.coe_toAddEquiv,
    op_add_equiv_symm_apply, Function.comp_apply, unop_op, to_finsupp_iso_apply, to_finsupp_monomial,
    add_monoid_algebra.op_ring_equiv_single, to_finsupp_iso_symm_apply, of_finsupp_single]
#align op_ring_equiv_op_monomial op_ring_equiv_op_monomial
op_ring_equiv_op_X:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_op_X : op_ring_equiv R (op (X : polynomial R)) = X :=
  op_ring_equiv_op_monomial 1 1
#align op_ring_equiv_op_X op_ring_equiv_op_X
op_ring_equiv_op_C_mul_X_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
theorem op_ring_equiv_op_C_mul_X_pow (r : R) (n : ℕ) :
    op_ring_equiv R (op (C r * X ^ n : polynomial R)) = C (op r) * X ^ n := by
  simp only [X_pow_mul, op_mul, op_pow, map_mul, map_pow, op_ring_equiv_op_X, op_ring_equiv_op_C]
#align op_ring_equiv_op_C_mul_X_pow op_ring_equiv_op_C_mul_X_pow
op_ring_equiv_op_C:
@[simp]
theorem op_ring_equiv_op_C (a : R) : op_ring_equiv R (op (C a)) = C (op a) :=
  op_ring_equiv_op_monomial 0 a
#align op_ring_equiv_op_C op_ring_equiv_op_C
nat_degree_op_ring_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem nat_degree_op_ring_equiv (p : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» (polynomial R)) :
    (op_ring_equiv R p).nat_degree = (unop p).nat_degree :=
  by
  by_cases p0 : p = 0
  · simp only [p0, _root_.map_zero, nat_degree_zero, unop_zero]
  ·
    simp only [p0, nat_degree_eq_support_max', ne.def, AddEquivClass.map_eq_zero_iff, not_false_iff,
      support_op_ring_equiv, unop_eq_zero_iff]
#align nat_degree_op_ring_equiv nat_degree_op_ring_equiv
leading_coeff_op_ring_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem leading_coeff_op_ring_equiv (p : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» (polynomial R)) :
    (op_ring_equiv R p).leading_coeff = op (unop p).leading_coeff := by
  rw [leading_coeff, coeff_op_ring_equiv, nat_degree_op_ring_equiv, leading_coeff]
#align leading_coeff_op_ring_equiv leading_coeff_op_ring_equiv
coeff_op_ring_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵐᵒᵖ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
@[simp]
theorem coeff_op_ring_equiv (p : «expr ᵐᵒᵖ» (polynomial R)) (n : ℕ) :
    (op_ring_equiv R p).coeff n = op ((unop p).coeff n) :=
  by
  induction p using MulOpposite.rec'
  cases p
  rfl
#align coeff_op_ring_equiv coeff_op_ring_equiv
